name: Uncanny Hamlet
description:
This is a solo, in-development project that has been in active development since Fall of 2021.  Please keep in mind that because of this any mechanics and art may be subject to change in the near future.  If the demand exists I hope to put together a full steam release as soon as possible, ideally with dedicated servers and whatnot.

Because there is a decent chance of encountering bugs, if you would like to help with this game's development please join the official Discord and report any problems you may find:  https://discord.gg/AzrNeMtFc5
